name: Daylight Denizens: A Collection of drawings by Randy Ramos
description:
This book is focused on people studies I've drawn over the course of several months. Anywhere I go, I take my sketchbook with me and observe those around me and thats how Daylight Denizens came to be. The book is 40 pages long with more than 70 character studies!

I'll include a doodle and a free colored mini print with your order! Thank you kindly for your interest! 

For more art please visit: http://drawrara.blogspot.com/
instagram: @drawrara
